title: Calories in a Hawaiian Roll
meta_description: Discover calories in a hawaiian roll, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per roll with easy tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard soft Hawaiian dinner roll (e.g., King's brand), about 43 g, baked with pineapple juice and sugar, no toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One Hawaiian roll has about 90 kcal, mostly from carbs with some sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat Hawaiian roll variant

faqs.q: How many calories in a Hawaiian roll?
What are the carbs in a Hawaiian roll?
faqs.a: About 18 g carbs, including 6 g sugars and 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Hawaiian roll high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, due to added pineapple juice; 6 g sugars per roll.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Hawaiian roll?
Do Hawaiian rolls have trans fat?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in standard baked rolls.
